thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Potevio receives administrative penalty order

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Potevio receives administrative penalty order

organizations.name: hanghai regulatory bureau of china securities regulatory commission

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Shanghai Potevio Co Ltd
* Says it received an administrative penalty order from Shanghai Regulatory Bureau of China Securities Regulatory Commission, due to violation of securities and futures related laws and regulations
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/y9xRPC
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
